com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.behaviors

Interface FollowFlowField.FlowField<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of vector, either 2D or 3D, implementing the Vector interface
    Enclosing class:
    FollowFlowField<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>

    public static interface FollowFlowField.FlowField<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<T>>
    A FlowField defines a mapping from a location in space to a flow vector. Typically flow fields are implemented as a multidimensional array representing a grid of cells. In each cell of the grid lives a flow vector.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T lookup(T position)
      Returns the flow vector for the specified position in space.

    • Method Detail

      • lookup

        T lookup(T position)
        Returns the flow vector for the specified position in space.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to map
